transcript.title: UNKNOWN
transcript.content:
PRIME MINISTER 5 JUNE 1991
It is the standard practice of Government to
nor deny speculation about ASIO operations. neither confirm
But I will deny categorically that the Government has ever
used phone tap material improperly and, in particular,
politically, or has ever sought material for those purposes.
79 1 8
FOR MEDIA
1111110111W
